content.data:
[Y]Game Evaluation
[W]Teach critique through play.
[c][m.]
[W]Ask learners to evaluate clarity,
[W]fairness and feedback in the games
[W]they play.
[W]Structured critique improves both
[W]analysis and future project quality.
[c][m.]
[G]- Clear goals?
[G]- Fair challenge?
[G]- Readable feedback?
[m][m-]
[Y]ASSESSMENT
[C]Explain your judgement with evidence.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
